name: The Runed Staff of Life
data: It increases the users strength a bit.
It increases the users dexterity pathetically.
It increases the users constitution noticably.
It has weak armour class for its type (pathetic in general).
It increases the users hitpoint regeneration noticably.
It increases the users physical resistance somewhat.
It increases the users poison resistance somewhat.
This item loses its magical powers with average speed.
